gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 128, Pistons 122
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics defeated the Pistons, 128-122, in overtime. Kristaps Porzingis recorded a new season-high 35 points, along with eight rebounds for the Celtics, with Jayson Tatum adding 31 points, 10 assists, and seven rebounds in the victory. Cade Cunningham tallied 31 points, nine assists, and six rebounds for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Celtics improve to 15-0 at home and 24-6 in the regular season, while the Pistons lose their 28th straight game and fall to 2-29.
